raw: Bolsonaro Found Virus-Free After Aide’s Result, Trump Dinner .

raw: ( Bloomberg ) -- Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro tested negative for coronavirus , giving his inner circle and allies some relief after a close aide was diagnosed with the illness .
replaced: ( Bloomberg ) -- The Brazilian leader tested negative for Coronavirus , giving The Brazilian leader inner circle and allies some relief after a close aide was diagnosed with Coronavirus .

raw: He announced the results of his test on social media , along with a picture of himself making a rude gesture used by many to tell off their critics .
replaced: The Brazilian leader announced the results of The Brazilian leader test on social media , along with a picture of The Brazilian leader making a rude gesture used by many to tell off many critics .

raw: The Brazilian leader had been under medical observation since his Communications Secretary Fabio Wajngarten tested positive for the virus on Thursday .
replaced: The Brazilian leader had been under medical observation since The Brazilian leader Communications Secretary Fabio Wajngarten tested positive for Coronavirus on Thursday .

raw: Both officials were part of a delegation that met with U.S. President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence last weekend in Mar - a - Lago .
replaced: Both officials were part of Trump ’s delegation  Trump and Vice President Mike Pence last weekend in Mar - a - Lago .

raw: Other members of Trump ’s delegation tested negative for Covid-19 , including Defense Minister Fernando Azevedo and Institutional Security Minister Augusto Heleno .

raw: First Lady Michele Bolsonaro is also virus free .

raw: Results for Foreign Affairs Minister Ernesto Araujo will be known on Saturday .

raw: Coronavirus has spread rapidly throughout Latin America since the region ’s first case was confirmed in Brazil on Feb. 26 .
replaced: Coronavirus has spread rapidly throughout Latin America since the region ’s first case was confirmed in Brazil on Feb. 26 .

raw: Argentina has temporarily banned all international flights from virus hotspots around the world , while Peru has delayed the start of its school year and Colombia ordered travelers from China , Italy , Spain and France to self - quarantine .
replaced: Argentina has temporarily banned all international flights from virus hotspots around the world , while Peru has delayed the start of Peru school year and Colombia ordered travelers from China , Italy , Spain and France to self - quarantine .

raw: Bolsonaro had minimized the coronavirus outbreak as recently as Tuesday while speaking at an event in front of roughly 300 American and Brazilian entrepreneurs in Miami .

raw: “ We have a small crisis at the moment , ” he said at the time .
